verses.verse: O ye children <S%H1121><s%> of Benjamin, <S%H1144><s%> gather yourselves to flee <S%H5756><s%> out of the midst <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7130><s%> of Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> and blow <S%H8628><s%> the trumpet <S%H7782><s%> in Tekoa, <S%H8620><s%> and set up <S%H5375><s%> a sign of fire <S%H4864><s%> in <S%H5921><s%> Beth-haccerem: <S%H1021><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> appeareth <S%H8259><s%> out of the north, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6828><s%> and great <S%H1419><s%> destruction. <S%H7667><s%>
I have likened <S%H1819><s%> the daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion <S%H6726><s%> to a comely <S%H5000><s%> and delicate <S%H6026><s%> woman.

The shepherds <S%H7462><s%> with their flocks <S%H5739><s%> shall come <S%H935><s%> unto <S%H413><s%> her; they shall pitch <S%H8628><s%> their tents <S%H168><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> her round about; <S%H5439><s%> they shall feed <S%H7462><s%> every one <S%H376><s%> in <S%H854><s%> his place. <S%H3027><s%>

Prepare <S%H6942><s%> ye war <S%H4421><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> her; arise, <S%H6965><s%> and let us go up <S%H5927><s%> at noon. <S%H6672><s%> Woe <S%H188><s%> unto us! for <S%H3588><s%> the day <S%H3117><s%> goeth away, <S%H6437><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the shadows <S%H6752><s%> of the evening <S%H6153><s%> are stretched out. <S%H5186><s%>
Arise, <S%H6965><s%> and let us go <S%H5927><s%> by night, <S%H3915><s%> and let us destroy <S%H7843><s%> her palaces. <S%H759><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> hath the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts <S%H6635><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> Hew ye down <S%H3772><s%> trees, <S%H6097><s%> and cast <S%H8210><s%> a mount <S%H5550><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> Jerusalem: <S%H3389><s%> this <S%H1931><s%> is the city <S%H5892><s%> to be visited; <S%H6485><s%> she is wholly <S%H3605><s%> oppression <S%H6233><s%> in the midst <S%H7130><s%> of her.

As a fountain <S%H953><s%> casteth out <S%H6979><s%> her waters, <S%H4325><s%> so <S%H3651><s%> she casteth <S%H6979><s%> out her wickedness: <S%H7451><s%> violence <S%H2555><s%> and spoil <S%H7701><s%> is heard <S%H8085><s%> in her; before <S%H5921><s%> <S%H6440><s%> me continually <S%H8548><s%> is grief <S%H2483><s%> and wounds. <S%H4347><s%>

Be thou instructed, <S%H3256><s%> O Jerusalem, <S%H3389><s%> lest <S%H6435><s%> my soul <S%H5315><s%> depart <S%H3363><s%> from <S%H4480><s%> thee; lest <S%H6435><s%> I make <S%H7760><s%> thee desolate, <S%H8077><s%> a land <S%H776><s%> not <S%H3808><s%> inhabited. <S%H3427><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> of hosts, <S%H6635><s%> They shall throughly glean <S%H5953><s%> <S%H5953><s%> the remnant <S%H7611><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> as a vine: <S%H1612><s%> turn back <S%H7725><s%> thine hand <S%H3027><s%> as a grape gatherer <S%H1219><s%> into <S%H5921><s%> the baskets. <S%H5552><s%>

To <S%H5921><s%> whom <S%H4310><s%> shall I speak, <S%H1696><s%> and give warning, <S%H5749><s%> that they may hear? <S%H8085><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> their ear <S%H241><s%> is uncircumcised, <S%H6189><s%> and they cannot <S%H3201><s%> <S%H3808><s%> hearken: <S%H7181><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> the word <S%H1697><s%> of the LORD <S%H3068><s%> is <S%H1961><s%> unto them a reproach; <S%H2781><s%> they have no <S%H3808><s%> delight <S%H2654><s%> in it.

Therefore I am full <S%H4392><s%> of <S%H854><s%> the fury <S%H2534><s%> of the LORD; <S%H3068><s%> I am weary <S%H3811><s%> with holding <S%H3557><s%> in: I will pour it out <S%H8210><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the children <S%H5768><s%> abroad, <S%H2351><s%> and upon <S%H5921><s%> the assembly <S%H5475><s%> of young men <S%H970><s%> together: <S%H3162><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> even <S%H1571><s%> the husband <S%H376><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> the wife <S%H802><s%> shall be taken, <S%H3920><s%> the aged <S%H2205><s%> with <S%H5973><s%> him that is full <S%H4390><s%> of days. <S%H3117><s%>

And their houses <S%H1004><s%> shall be turned <S%H5437><s%> unto others, <S%H312><s%> with their fields <S%H7704><s%> and wives <S%H802><s%> together: <S%H3162><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> I will stretch out <S%H5186><s%> <S%H853><s%> my hand <S%H3027><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of the land, <S%H776><s%> saith <S%H5002><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

For <S%H3588><s%> from the least <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6996><s%> of them even unto <S%H5704><s%> the greatest <S%H1419><s%> of them every one <S%H3605><s%> is given to <S%H1214><s%> covetousness; <S%H1215><s%> and from the prophet <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5030><s%> even unto <S%H5704><s%> the priest <S%H3548><s%> every one <S%H3605><s%> dealeth <S%H6213><s%> falsely. <S%H8267><s%>

They have healed <S%H7495><s%> also <S%H853><s%> the hurt <S%H7667><s%> of the daughter of my people <S%H5971><s%> slightly, <S%H5921><s%> <S%H7043><s%> saying, <S%H559><s%> Peace, <S%H7965><s%> peace; <S%H7965><s%> when there is no <S%H369><s%> peace. <S%H7965><s%>

Were they ashamed <S%H954><s%> when <S%H3588><s%> they had committed <S%H6213><s%> abomination? <S%H8441><s%> nay, <S%H1571><s%> they were not <S%H3808><s%> at all ashamed, <S%H954><s%> <S%H954><s%> neither <S%H3808><s%> could <S%H3045><s%> they blush: <S%H3637><s%> therefore <S%H3651><s%> they shall fall <S%H5307><s%> among them that fall: <S%H5307><s%> at the time <S%H6256><s%> that I visit <S%H6485><s%> them they shall be cast down, <S%H3782><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD. <S%H3068><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Stand <S%H5975><s%> ye in <S%H5921><s%> the ways, <S%H1870><s%> and see, <S%H7200><s%> and ask <S%H7592><s%> for the old <S%H5769><s%> paths, <S%H5410><s%> where <S%H335><s%> <S%H2088><s%> is the good <S%H2896><s%> way, <S%H1870><s%> and walk <S%H1980><s%> therein, and ye shall find <S%H4672><s%> rest <S%H4771><s%> for your souls. <S%H5315><s%> But they said, <S%H559><s%> We will not <S%H3808><s%> walk <S%H1980><s%> therein.

Also I set <S%H6965><s%> watchmen <S%H6822><s%> over <S%H5921><s%> you, saying, Hearken <S%H7181><s%> to the sound <S%H6963><s%> of the trumpet. <S%H7782><s%> But they said, <S%H559><s%> We will not <S%H3808><s%> hearken. <S%H7181><s%>
Therefore <S%H3651><s%> hear, <S%H8085><s%> ye nations, <S%H1471><s%> and know, <S%H3045><s%> O congregation, <S%H5712><s%> <S%H853><s%> what <S%H834><s%> is among them.

Hear, <S%H8085><s%> O earth: <S%H776><s%> behold, <S%H2009><s%> I <S%H595><s%> will bring <S%H935><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> upon <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> even the fruit <S%H6529><s%> of their thoughts, <S%H4284><s%> because <S%H3588><s%> they have not <S%H3808><s%> hearkened <S%H7181><s%> unto <S%H5921><s%> my words, <S%H1697><s%> nor to my law, <S%H8451><s%> but rejected <S%H3988><s%> it.

To what <S%H4100><s%> purpose <S%H2088><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%> there to me incense <S%H3828><s%> from Sheba, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H7614><s%> and the sweet <S%H2896><s%> cane <S%H7070><s%> from a far <S%H4801><s%> country? <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> your burnt offerings <S%H5930><s%> are not <S%H3808><s%> acceptable, <S%H7522><s%> nor <S%H3808><s%> your sacrifices <S%H2077><s%> sweet <S%H6149><s%> unto me.

Therefore <S%H3651><s%> thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> I will lay <S%H5414><s%> stumblingblocks <S%H4383><s%> before <S%H413><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> people, <S%H5971><s%> and the fathers <S%H1><s%> and the sons <S%H1121><s%> together <S%H3162><s%> shall fall <S%H3782><s%> upon them; the neighbor <S%H7934><s%> and his friend <S%H7453><s%> shall perish. <S%H6><s%>

Thus <S%H3541><s%> saith <S%H559><s%> the LORD, <S%H3068><s%> Behold, <S%H2009><s%> a people <S%H5971><s%> cometh <S%H935><s%> from the north <S%H6828><s%> country, <S%H4480><s%> <S%H776><s%> and a great <S%H1419><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> shall be raised <S%H5782><s%> from the sides <S%H4480><s%> <S%H3411><s%> of the earth. <S%H776><s%>

They shall lay hold <S%H2388><s%> on bow <S%H7198><s%> and spear; <S%H3591><s%> they <S%H1931><s%> are cruel, <S%H394><s%> and have no <S%H3808><s%> mercy; <S%H7355><s%> their voice <S%H6963><s%> roareth <S%H1993><s%> like the sea; <S%H3220><s%> and they ride <S%H7392><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> horses, <S%H5483><s%> set in array <S%H6186><s%> as men <S%H376><s%> for war <S%H4421><s%> against <S%H5921><s%> thee, O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of Zion. <S%H6726><s%>

We have heard <S%H8085><s%> <S%H853><s%> the fame <S%H8089><s%> thereof: our hands <S%H3027><s%> wax feeble: <S%H7503><s%> anguish <S%H6869><s%> hath taken hold <S%H2388><s%> of us, and pain, <S%H2427><s%> as of a woman in travail. <S%H3205><s%>

Go not forth <S%H408><s%> <S%H3318><s%> into the field, <S%H7704><s%> nor <S%H408><s%> walk <S%H1980><s%> by the way; <S%H1870><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the sword <S%H2719><s%> of the enemy <S%H341><s%> and fear <S%H4032><s%> is on every side. <S%H4480><s%> <S%H5439><s%>

O daughter <S%H1323><s%> of my people, <S%H5971><s%> gird <S%H2296><s%> thee with sackcloth, <S%H8242><s%> and wallow thyself <S%H6428><s%> in ashes: <S%H665><s%> make <S%H6213><s%> thee mourning, <S%H60><s%> as for an only son, <S%H3173><s%> most bitter <S%H8563><s%> lamentation: <S%H4553><s%> for <S%H3588><s%> the spoiler <S%H7703><s%> shall suddenly <S%H6597><s%> come <S%H935><s%> upon <S%H5921><s%> us.

I have set <S%H5414><s%> thee for a tower <S%H969><s%> and a fortress <S%H4013><s%> among my people, <S%H5971><s%> that thou mayest know <S%H3045><s%> and try <S%H974><s%> <S%H853><s%> their way. <S%H1870><s%>

They are all <S%H3605><s%> grievous <S%H5493><s%> revolters, <S%H5637><s%> walking <S%H1980><s%> with slanders: <S%H7400><s%> they are brass <S%H5178><s%> and iron; <S%H1270><s%> they <S%H1992><s%> are all <S%H3605><s%> corrupters. <S%H7843><s%>

The bellows <S%H4647><s%> are burned, <S%H2787><s%> the lead <S%H5777><s%> is consumed <S%H8552><s%> of the fire; <S%H4480><s%> <S%H784><s%> the founder <S%H6884><s%> melteth <S%H6884><s%> in vain: <S%H7723><s%> for the wicked <S%H7451><s%> are not <S%H3808><s%> plucked away. <S%H5423><s%>
Reprobate <S%H3988><s%> silver <S%H3701><s%> shall men call <S%H7121><s%> them, because <S%H3588><s%> the LORD <S%H3068><s%> hath rejected <S%H3988><s%> them.
